## The Greatest Determinant

Determine the value of the determinant of
\begin{vmatrix}\gcd (1,1)&\gcd (1,2)&\cdots &\gcd (1,n)\\\gcd (2,1)&\gcd (2,2)&\cdots &\gcd (2,n)\\\vdots&\vdots&\ddots&\vdots\\\gcd (n,1)&\gcd (n,2)&\cdots &\gcd (n,n)\end{vmatrix}\
:::

:::{.callout-tip}
## Some Eigen Stuffs 

Distinct Eigen-Values correspond to linearly independent Eigen-Vectors.(Prove it !!)

:::{.callout-tip}
## Determinant and Matrices

Let us represent $\; p(x)=|A+xB|$ , where A and B are $2 \times 2$ matrices. Then find the matrix M such that $p(x)=(detB)x^2+(detM)x+(detA)$
:::

## Series is good for Health

:::{.callout-tip}
### Same-Same Yet Different!!

A is a $n \times m$ matrix and B is a $m \times n$ matrix . If $|I_{n} - AB|$ is non-singular so is $|I_{m} - BA|$
:::
